examples: Input:root1 = [2,1,4], root2 = [1,0,3], target = 5Output:trueExplanation:2 and 3 sum up to 5.
constraints: The number of nodes in each tree is in the range[1, 5000].
data.problem_statement: Given the roots of two binary search trees,root1androot2, returntrueif and only if there is a node in the first tree and a node in the second tree whose values sum up to a given integertarget.
data.title: Two Sum BSTs
